abstract: Facing mostly repeat competition on Thursday, new episodes of CBS’s regular line-up dominated the night’s ratings, leading every hour of prime time by a wide margin. CBS’s “CSI” at 9 p.m. delivered the night’s largest audience with 19.8 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. No show on any other network garnered even half that many viewers.
lead_paragraph: Facing mostly repeat competition on Thursday, new episodes of CBS’s regular line-up dominated the night’s ratings, leading every hour of prime time by a wide margin. CBS’s “CSI” at 9 p.m. delivered the night’s largest audience with 19.8 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. No show on any other network garnered even half that many viewers.

headline.main: Ratings: In Land Of Reruns, CBS Is King
